subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: With the Knicks guard, and Harvard alumnus, Jeremy Lin in the stands, the Crimson held off the Lions in overtime to keep alive their chances of winning the Ivy League title.
snippet: With the Knicks guard, and Harvard alumnus, Jeremy Lin in the stands, the Crimson held off the Lions in overtime to keep alive their chances of winning the Ivy League title.
